trans-unit.source: Train
trans-unit.target: Train

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning / Train
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning / Train

trans-unit.source: For your machine learning model to provide predictions, the model must first learn from known data in a process known as training.
trans-unit.target: For your machine learning model to provide predictions, the model must first learn from known data in a process known as training.

trans-unit.source: During training, data is evaluated by the machine learning algorithm, which analyzes the distribution and type of the data, looking for rules and patterns that can be used later prediction.
trans-unit.target: During training, data is evaluated by the machine learning algorithm, which analyzes the distribution and type of the data, looking for rules and patterns that can be used later prediction.

trans-unit.source: <token>ProductName</token> then stores the trained model in your workspace so that you can generate scores from the trained model without having to retrain, on data.
trans-unit.target: <token>ProductName</token> then stores the trained model in your workspace so that you can generate scores from the trained model without having to retrain, on data.

trans-unit.source: The way you train the model depends on the type of model you are creating, and the type of data that the model requires as input.
trans-unit.target: The way you train the model depends on the type of model you are creating, and the type of data that the model requires as input.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, check the following list of training modules to determine which one is correct for your scenario.
trans-unit.target: Therefore, check the following list of training modules to determine which one is correct for your scenario.

trans-unit.source: Related Tasks
trans-unit.target: Related Tasks

trans-unit.source: Cross-validation also trains a model, or multiple models.
trans-unit.target: Cross-validation also trains a model, or multiple models.

trans-unit.source: You can use <link xlink:href="75fb875d-6b86-4d46-8bcc-74261ade5826" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross Validate</link> as well as <link xlink:href="038d91b6-c2f2-42a1-9215-1f2c20ed1b40" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Parameter sweep</link> as part of model optimization.
trans-unit.target: You can use <link xlink:href="75fb875d-6b86-4d46-8bcc-74261ade5826" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross Validate</link> as well as <link xlink:href="038d91b6-c2f2-42a1-9215-1f2c20ed1b40" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Parameter sweep</link> as part of model optimization.

trans-unit.source: Missing Value Handling
trans-unit.target: Missing Value Handling

trans-unit.source: When Azure Machine Learning is training a model and encounters rows with missing values, any rows with missing values are skipped.
trans-unit.target: When Azure Machine Learning is training a model and encounters rows with missing values, any rows with missing values are skipped.

trans-unit.source: If you need to impute values, use <link xlink:href="d2c5ca2f-7323-41a3-9b7e-da917c99f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">clean Missing Data</link> module before using the dataset for training.
trans-unit.target: If you need to impute values, use <link xlink:href="d2c5ca2f-7323-41a3-9b7e-da917c99f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">clean Missing Data</link> module before using the dataset for training.

trans-unit.source: List of Modules
trans-unit.target: List of Modules

trans-unit.source: The category Modules References.Machine Learning.Train includes these modules:
trans-unit.target: The category Modules References.Machine Learning.Train includes these modules:

trans-unit.source: Module
trans-unit.target: Module

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Performs a parameter sweep on a model to determine the optimum parameter settings
trans-unit.target: Performs a parameter sweep on a model to determine the optimum parameter settings

trans-unit.source: Trains a clustering model and assigns data from the training set to clusters
trans-unit.target: Trains a clustering model and assigns data from the training set to clusters

trans-unit.source: Trains a Bayesian recommender using the Matchbox algorithm
trans-unit.target: Trains a Bayesian recommender using the Matchbox algorithm

trans-unit.source: Trains a classification or regression model in a supervised manner
trans-unit.target: Trains a classification or regression model in a supervised manner

trans-unit.source: Trains an anomaly detector model and labels data from the training set
trans-unit.target: Trains an anomaly detector model and labels data from the training set
